unnormalised: Nhovjea bhurgeank, sadharan temp 97.5-99.5°F aspas asta, ani zori bhurgeak tap 100.4°F poros chodd asta zalear Calpol (Paracetamol) sarkhea vokhdanchea dosage vixim pediatrician-achem mat gheunuch cholat.
normalised: Zolm zal'lea bhurgeank sadharan tapman nnev'vyanto point panch te nnev'vyanno point panch degree fahrenheit asta, ani zaka tapman ekxem point char degree fahrenheit asa zalear Calpol (Paracetamol) sarkhea voukhodhanchea mapan khatir tumchea pediatricianachem mat gheuya.
